contentrichtext.text: {{other uses}} In [[Norse mythology]] according to the [[Eddic poem]] ''[[Rígsþula]]'', '''Erna''' was the mother of eleven sons by [[Jarl (mythology)|Jarl]], the ancestors of the class of warriors in Norse society. Her father was [[Hersir]], a tribal chief. ==References== *Dugdale-Pointon, TDP. (21 March 2001), Hersir, Viking, *http://www.historyofwar.org/articles/weapons_hersir.html *http://www.cybersamurai.net/Mythology/nordic_gods/LegendsSagas/Edda/PoeticEdda/Rigsthula.htm {{Norse mythology}} [[Category:People in Norse mythology and legends]] {{Norse-myth-stub}}
